articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Congratulates Guinean President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Congratulates Guinean President
 Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Monday sent a message of congratulations to Alpha Conde upon his election as president of Guinea.
					 Kim in the message expressed belief that the good relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would steadily grow stronger in the future, too, wishing him good health and happiness and success in his work for the political stability and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Japan Accused of Its Shameless Moves to Dodge Its Past Crimes
articles.content:
Japan Accused of Its Shameless Moves to Dodge Its Past Crimes
Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- The Foreign Ministry of Germany issued an instruction to its embassies overseas to remove the portraits of the former ambassadors involved in the fascist acts in the Nazi era. This action was taken by Germany not to repeat those crimes as part of the moves to settle its past crimes. 
					Minju Joson Tuesday observes this in a signed commentary.
					
					Quite contrary to Germany's behavior, Japan has neither admitted nor apologized, nor paid for the past crimes committed by the Japanese imperialists during its invasion of Korea, nor showed any intention to do so for more than six decades since the end of the war.
					
					The Japanese reactionaries, however, are becoming so brazen-faced as to distort and justify the crimes perpetrated by the Japanese imperialists against humanity in the past, kicking up a whirlwind of militarism throughout the society. 
					
					It is a legal and moral obligation and a historical task of Japan to redeem its past crimes.
					
					Japan is craftily behaving with the calculation that the flow of time would make its past crimes fade away from the minds of the people and they would be no longer a subject of discussion in the end. This is a serious miscalculation.
					
					If Japan tries to keep its past crimes buried into oblivion by going without redressing them, this would only add to its crimes and invite more serious punishment.
					
					No matter how much water may flow under the bridge, the Korean people will never forget the Japanese imperialists' history of criminal aggression of Korea but force Japan to pay for it without fail.
					
					Japan would be well advised to face up to the trend of the times towards settling past crimes and opt for redeeming its past wrongs as soon as possible.

articles.title: Koreans Called upon to Abide by Three Principles of National Reunification
articles.content:
Koreans Called upon to Abide by Three Principles of National Reunification
Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- The three principles of national reunification--independence, peaceful reunification and great national unity--which the north and the south solemnly declared at home and abroad through the historic July 4 joint statement have served as a cornerstone of national reunification as it clarified the basic stand and ways of solving the issue of Koreaâ€™s reunification on the principle of national independence. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says this in a signed article.
					
					 The June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration serve as declarations for national independence, peaceful reunification and the great national unity and a great programme for national reunification in the new century as they fully embody the three principles of national reunification, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The provisions of the declarations are based on the above-said three principles. 
					
					 In the declarations the north and the south promised each other to independently settle the issue of national reunification by their concerted efforts as they are responsible for settling the issue of reunification, and subordinate everything to it, attaching importance to the dignity and interests of the nation. This means providing a sure guarantee for independently solving the issue of national reunification by the concerted efforts of the Korean nation free from any foreign interference.  
					
					 It is of great historical importance for the north and the south to have decided to closely cooperate with each other in their efforts to put end to their military and hostile relations and ease tension and ensure peace on the Korean Peninsula and to settle all issues arising in improving the inter-Korean relations and achieving the reunification of the country through dialogues and negotiations. This also indicates a basic way of peacefully achieving national reunification free from any struggle between compatriots.
					
					 In the declarations the north and the south also decided to definitely turn the inter-Korean relations into those of mutual respect and trust irrespective of ideology and system and settle the issues of inter-Korean relations in conformity with reconciliation, cooperation and reunification. This paved a wide avenue for achieving the great unity of the entire nation under the banners of patriotism and national reunification, transcending the interests of all classes and strata irrespective of ideology and system, political view and religious belief, concludes the article.

articles.title: Streamlined Furniture Factory
articles.content:
Streamlined Furniture Factory
Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- The Taedonggang Furniture Factory in Pyongyang is one of the leading furniture producers in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 Well-designed furniture such as chairs, tables, kitchen furnishings, and bedclothes and clothes chests of various shapes are made by the factory.
					
					 Some of its products enjoyed popularity at a national exhibition of successes in quality control and other exhibitions.
					
					 The factory, with a 60-year-long history, has carried out lots of technical innovation schemes, including a three-dimensional design program, to steadily update the production processes and improve the quality of products.
					
					 It has also wound up technical preparations for standardizing furniture colors favored by customers, and refurbished the decorating, drying and other processes with up-to-date equipment.

articles.title: Korean Underfloor Heating System
articles.content:
Korean Underfloor Heating System
 Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- Kudul, or ondol, means an underfloor heating system of a room invented by the Korean nation.
					 It, originated from bonfire, had a hypocaust flue at the start and then developed into a heating system with a fire hole and several flues. 
					
					 Later, a kitchen fire entrance was installed between fire hole and flues to elevate thermal efficiency and a channel was made between flues and chimney to block smoke and cold air.
					
					 Kudul, which is simple in structure, keeps warmth long and helps promote blood circulation, have a good sleep and cure diseases.
					
					 Kudul has drawn public interest in some other countries, too.
					
					 Hot-water and electricity heating systems of floor based on hypocaust flues were developed in Germany and vocabularies "kudul" and "ondol" are used as commercial terms and found in dictionaries in some countries.

articles.title: Release of Rev. Han Sang Ryol Demanded
articles.content:
Release of Rev. Han Sang Ryol Demanded
Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Progress in south Korea held an event titled "evening of reunification for urging the release of Rev. Hang Sang Ryol and aiding him" in Seoul on Dec. 2.
					 Speeches were made by Kim Sang Gun, permanent representative of the South Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration, O Jong Ryol, permanent advisor to the Solidarity for Progress, and Ri Kang Sil, permanent co-representative of the solidarity who is wife of Rev. Han, at the event.
					
					 The speakers accused the authorities of persecuting pro-reunification champion Rev. Han after detaining him at the Seoul Prison on charges of the violation of the "National Security Law" though he conducted activities to preserve and implement the June 15 joint declaration and achieve national reconciliation, cooperation and reunification.
					
					 They stressed that people from all walks of life would stage actions in demand of the release of Rev. Han.

articles.title: Formation of Vietnam-DPRK Friendship Association Observed
articles.content:
Formation of Vietnam-DPRK Friendship Association Observed
Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- A meeting and an art performance co-sponsored by the Federation of Friendly Organizations of Vietnam and the Vietnam-DPRK Friendship Association took place in Hanoi on December 1 on the occasion of the 45th anniversary of the formation of the association. 
					 Pham Tat Dong, chairman of the association, said that the association has made a great contribution to strengthening the friendship and solidarity between the peoples of the two countries in various fields in diverse forms and by various methods.
					
					 He noted that the association has steadily expanded its affiliated organizations nationwide over the past 45 years and conducted brisk activities in support of the just cause of the Korean people, expressing his determination to intensify its work in the future.
					
					 The repertoire of the art performance included Korean songs "Our General Is the Best" and "Pyongyang Is the Best."

articles.title: Naming Class of  DPRK Friendship Kindergarten after Kim Il Sung Held
articles.content:
Naming Class of  DPRK Friendship Kindergarten after Kim Il Sung Held
Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- A ceremony of naming a class of the Vietnam-DPRK Friendship Kindergarten after Kim Il Sung took place in Hanoi on December 2.
					 Present there were personages of the Vietnam-DPRK Friendship Association, the Vietnam-DPRK Friendship Kindergarten and the educational field in Hanoi City, members of the DPRK friendship delegation on a visit to Vietnam and staff members of the DPRK embassy in Hanoi.
					
					 The above-said kindergarten was built thanks to President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The director of the kindergarten said she deemed it great pleasure and honor to have in the kindergarten a class carrying the august name of the President this year, the diamond jubilee of the opening of diplomatic relations between the two countries.
					
					 She vowed to help not only the Kim Il Sung Class but all its children and teachers know well about the immortal feats performed by the President in the development of the bilateral relations and make a positive contribution to carrying forward and developing the friendly relations generation after generation.
					
					 An art performance was given by children of the kindergarten at the event.

articles.title: Important Days of DPRK Marked in Italy and Russia
articles.content:
Important Days of DPRK Marked in Italy and Russia
Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- A meeting and photo exhibition were held in Italy and a DPRK book and photo exhibition and handicraft exhibition were opened in Russia with due ceremony on December 1 and November 30 on the occasions of the 19th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 93rd birth anniversary of Kim Jong Suk, anti-Japanese heroine. 
					 Displayed in the venues of the events were books showing the immortal revolutionary feats of the three commanders of Mt. Paektu, photos on their revolutionary activities, books and photos introducing the Korean people's struggle to build a thriving socialist nation and achieve the  reunification of the country and handicrafts representing the wisdom and skills of the Korean nation.
					
					 The general secretary of the Struggle for the Peace and Socialism of Italy said in his speech that under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il the Korean People's Army has played a great role in the defence of the country and socialist construction, shattering the war moves of the U.S. imperialists and all hues of hostile forces against the DPRK and demonstrated its might as an army strong in thinking and faith.
					
					  Victory and glory are always in store for the KPA holding Kim Jong Il as its supreme commander, he added.
					
					  The director of the Citta Aperta Broadcasting Service of Italy said that Kim Jong Suk is still remembered by the Korean people with profound respect for the immortal feats she performed in the struggle for the sovereignty and dignity of the country and the nation and the women's emancipation.
					
					 The vice-governor of the Kostroma Regional Administration of Russia said that he was proud of opening the said exhibitions in the region, highly estimating the successes made by the Korean people in the cultural field.

articles.title: Story of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Story of Kim Il Sung
Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- In early November Juche 22 (1933) fierce battles were going on to defend the Xiaowangqing guerrilla base from Japanese troops' attack. 
					 They, availing themselves of their upperhand in strength and weapons, persisted in attacking the base though they suffered repeated defeats.
					
					 Such being the situation, a new tactics was needed to protect the base and its people.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung put forward a tactical proposal of stubbornly resisting the attack and, at the same time, striking the enemies in the rear and foiling their attempt to stifle the base with blockade and protracted battles. 
					
					 He said if the enemies' positions and strongholds were attacked, the news would be circulated and they would withdraw from the battlefield to protect their rear.
					
					 The President divided the guerrillas into two groups to keep one group defending the base and lead another group to advance into the enemies' rear after breaking through their siege. As he expected, the enemy rear was empty. 
					
					 With their rear attacked by the guerrillas, the Japanese troops could not but loose their siege and withdraw from the battlefield.

articles.title: Se producen en Corea muebles de nivel mundial
articles.content:
Se producen en Corea muebles de nivel mundial
Pyongyang, 7 de diciembre (ATCC) -- La Fabrica de Muebles Taedonggang situada en la ciudad de Pyongyang es una de las famosas bases de produccion mueblista de Corea.
					  Todos sus productos incluyendo sillas, mesas, mobiliarios de cocina, mesas redondas, armarios de edredones y roperos de diferentes formas fueron disenados y fabricados con fuerte matiz nacional y conforme al tamano y caracteristicas de las habitaciones. 
					
					  Todos ellos tienen diversos tipos y variedades y se han hecho con buenas materias primas, razon por la cual son aplaudidos por los usuarios.
					
					  Los muebles producidos por esa fabrica fueron calificados altamente en la exposicion nacional de los exitos de control de calidad y otras ocasiones.
					
					  Durante 60 anos desde su fundacion, la fabrica viene aplicando en la produccion numerosos proyectos de innovacion tecnica.
					
					  En los ultimos anos, introdujo el programa de diseno en el espacio tridimensional y el nuevo sistema de seleccion, de manera que se elevara la calidad de sus productos.
					
					ã€€Ademas, completo los preparativos tecnicos para estandarizar el colorido de los muebles que prefieren los usuarios.
					
					  Impulsa igualmente las labores para conquistar las tecnologias de punta como la introduccion de la tecnologia CNC en la elaboracion de adornos y la dotacion de numerosos equipos modernos, incluyendo la maquina automatica de secado.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun exhorta a mantener 3 principios de reunificacion de patria
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun exhorta a mantener 3 principios de reunificacion de patria
Pyongyang, 7 de diciembre (ATCC) -- En su articulo individual difundido este martes, el diario Rodong Sinmun senala que los 3 principios de la reunificacion de la patria, o sea, la independencia, la reunificacion pacifica y la gran unidad nacional, que han sido declarados solemnemente al interior y al exterior del pais por el Norte y el Sur de Corea a traves de la historica Declaracion Conjunta del 4 de Julio, son la piedra angular de la reunificacion de la patria que expuso la posicion y remedios fundamentales que pueden resolver ese asunto en el principio de independencia nacional.
					  La Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre son los manifiestos de independencia nacional, reunificacion pacifica y gran unidad nacional que materializan generalmente dichos principios, y el gran programa de reunificacion de la patria del nuevo siglo, comienza el articulista y continua:
					
					  Los articulos de las declaraciones Norte-Sur fueron estipulados segun esos 3 principios.
					
					  A traves de las declaraciones intercoreanas, el Norte y el Sur de Corea prometieron resolver de modo independiente el asunto de reunificacion con las fuerzas unidas de los connacionales, encargados directos, apreciar la dignidad y los intereses de la nacion y orientar lo todo a ese sentido. Esto significa que ambas partes coreanas procuraron la garantia para resolver de modo independiente el problema de reunificacion con las fuerzas unidas de los connacionales sin permitir la intervencion de cualesquier fuerzas extranjeras.
					
					  Tiene significado historico el acuerdo bilateral de cooperar estrechadamente para acabar con las relaciones militares hostiles y garantizar el aflojamiento de tension y la paz de la Peninsula Coreana y de resolver con dialogos y negociaciones todos los problemas que se presentan para mejorar las relaciones intercoreanas y lograr la reunificacion de la patria. Este acuerdo indica el remedio fundamental para lograr la reunificacion de la patria por via pacifica y sin la pelea fratricida.
					
					  En las declaraciones arriba mencionadas, ambas partes coreanas decidieron convertir las relaciones bilaterales en las de respeto mutuo y confianza por encima de las diferencias de ideologias y regimenes y solucionar los problemas entre si en sentido favorable a la reconciliacion, la cooperacion y la reunificacion. De esta manera, quedaron abiertas amplias posibilidades de lograr la gran unidad de toda la nacion coreana bajo la bandera de patriotismo y reunificacion de la patria, independientemente de las diferentes ideas, sistemas sociales, criterios politicos y religiones existentes en ambas partes y de los intereses de todas las clases y sectores.

articles.title: Minju Joson compara las actitudes contrastantes de Alemania y Japon
articles.content:
Minju Joson compara las actitudes contrastantes de Alemania y Japon
Pyongyang, 7 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Recientemente, el Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de Alemania dio a sus embajadas en el extranjero la indicacion de descolgar los retratos de los ex embajadores involucrados en las fechorias fascistas cometidas durante el nazismo.
					  Esta medida forma parte de las labores para la liquidacion de los crimenes del pasado y fue tomada para no repetirlos.
					
					  Asi senala el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual del dia 7 y continua:
					
					  En contraste, hasta la fecha a mas de 60 anos desde el fin de la Segunda Guerra Mundial, Japon no reconoce ni pide disculpas ni indemniza los crimenes cometidos por los imperialistas japoneses al agredir a otras naciones en el siglo pasado.
					
					  Por el contrario, los reaccionarios japoneses tergiversan y justifican descaradamente sus crimenes antieticos del pasado levantando la ola militarista en la sociedad japonesa.
					
					  La liquidacion del pasado criminal es la obligacion juridica y moral y la tarea historica de ese pais isleno.
					
					  Japon actua astutamente pensando que si pasa el tiempo, sus crimenes del pasado seran olvidados hasta que nadie hable de ellos. 
					
					  Los muy equivocados reaccionarios japoneses deben saber que si tratan de eludir la liquidacion del pasado y dejar en el olvido de la historia sus crimenes, se tornaran mas graves estos delitos y el castigo correspondiente. 
					
					  Aunque pasen muchos siglos, el pueblo coreano no olvidara jamas la ensangrentada historia de agresion a Corea de los imperialistas japoneses y cobrara sin falta su precio.
					
					  Japon debe ver correctamente la corriente de la epoca hacia la liquidacion del pasado y cumplir cuanto antes esta tarea.
